ISSUE.TITLE: document "Source Variables" in Source page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY The "source variable" field is basically undocumented now. There is a popup that links to an ec2.ini file, which returns a 404. ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: 9.1.0 * AWX install method: docker on linux * Ansible version: 2.8 * Operating System: Centos 7.7 * Web Browser: Firefox ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE Go to source page, click on question mark next to source variables ##### EXPECTED RESULTS Some useful information on how to use this field ##### ACTUAL RESULTS a popup linking to a 404 ##### ADDITIONAL INFORMATION <!-- Include any links to sosreport, database dumps, screenshots or other information. -->

COMMIT.MESSAGE: update (dead) links to example inv source vars see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/6538 some of these are subject to change (in particular, the azure one), but this at least fixes the dead links for now in ansible devel
